title: Hit Piece Incoming
author: VD
content_html:
This one should be entertaining. The narrative is transparently obvious and tends to indicate that while European SJWs are about a decade behind their US counterparts, they are every bit as dependent upon Wikipedia for their “research”. I’ll provide the link as well as a translation when it appears.

The funniest thing is that they actually rolled out the old “we want to let you tell your side of the story.”

DISCUSS ON SG
